biotools.summary: Interactive Tree Of Life (iTOL) is an online tool for the display and manipulation of phylogenetic trees. It provides a large variety of tree layouts, drawing and annotation features including circular tree layout. iTOL is well-suited for a wide range of tree sizes up to several thousand leaves. Tree displays can be exported in several graphical formats, both bitmap and vector based.
